sentences.english: There are new spin-off products aimed at older girls and women, such as sun screen and cosmetics.

sentences.english: What is caused by the use of cosmetics after pigmentation?

sentences.english: Be gentle when washing your face and hair or using cosmetics.

sentences.english: We offer fully refined oil for cosmetic application which is pale yellow in colour and is almost odourless .

sentences.english: As a resul t, nacre thickness is sometimes just a cosmetic layer t hat can wear thin over time.

sentences.english: This means that mineral cosmetics hold up well in moisture.
sentences.chinese: 这意思是矿物化妆品可以锁住皮肤的水分。

sentences.english: Secondly, mineral makeup is all natural and hypo-allergenic.
sentences.chinese: 其次，矿物化妆品是纯天然和无刺激性的。

sentences.english: Some plant gums are used in the manufacture of cosmetics.

sentences.english: It was point out that developing cosmetic safety raw materials was the main trend in cosmetic industry.

sentences.english: Every Estée is one of the world famous cosmetic brands.

sentences.english: They just use ordinary human make-up. And hair gel, too.
sentences.chinese: 他们给他用那些人们常用的化妆品，还有发胶。

sentences.english: Doctors, however, can often use a cosmetic eye shell to make it look more natural.
sentences.chinese: 医生也会使用化妆品假眼，使它看起来更自然。
